alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 2:11AM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 9 inches. * WHERE...Western Uinta Basin, mainly northern and western sections of the Basin, including Altamont, Fruitland and Tabiona. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. The heaviest snow is expected this afternoon and evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
